description: Tatsuki (known as Tatsukichi to Ran) is a wild and kind student at Machida West High School, and he calls himself "the parapara king of Machida" (also known as "Machida Black", since the "kuro" in his last name means "black"). He is often nicknamed "Monkey Boy" since his personality is very similar to that of a monkey.
name: Kuroi Tatsuki
